content:
@Grahame Grieve - you changed the emitter for extension and modifierExtension to have include the container name (e.g. fhir:modifierExtension --> fhir:DomainResource.modifierExtension). Was this intentional?

Thought I'd ask before I updated the ShEx emitter appropriately --- failed the validation test.
it was special, and there was no reason for it to special, and it was really hard for me to match that in JSON-LD
Good. Just making sure -- theoretically the ShEx has been changed to match it, but still working out some of the kinks. A majority of the ttl now validates
